pages.text: Is there anything cozier than sitting by your homemade fireplace on a rainy evening, sipping a cup of tea?\Surely: killing a boss beforehand.\\This tea, brewed from the petals of [Jade Vines](book://resources/jade_vines) is both good for relaxing and protecting you from the deadly effect of the Wither. _Convenient_.
